scene_description: Astronaut discovering alien artifact on Mars

structured_prompt.short_description: Astronaut discovers an alien artifact on the barren Martian landscape, evoking a feeling of awe and wonder

objects.description: Astronaut in a futuristic space suit, with a helmet and backpack, slowly approaching the alien artifact
objects.location: Center of the frame, with the artifact to their right
objects.relationship: The astronaut is the main subject, with the alien artifact as the secondary subject
objects.shape_and_color: The astronaut's suit is a metallic silver, with a gold-tinted helmet visor, while the alien artifact is a mysterious, glowing red-orange
objects.texture: The astronaut's suit has a smooth, metallic texture, while the alien artifact has a rough, crystalline texture
objects.appearance_details: The astronaut's suit is covered in small, intricate details, such as life support systems and communication equipment, while the alien artifact has an otherworldly, pulsing glow
objects.pose: The astronaut is standing upright, with their arms slightly bent and their hands grasping a sampling tool
objects.orientation: Facing the alien artifact, with their helmet visor reflecting the Martian landscape

objects.description: The alien artifact, a mysterious, glowing red-orange structure with an otherworldly shape and texture
objects.location: To the right of the astronaut, in the foreground
objects.relationship: The alien artifact is the secondary subject, with the astronaut as the main subject
objects.shape_and_color: The alien artifact has a unique, crystalline shape, with a glowing red-orange color that pulsates with an otherworldly energy
objects.texture: The alien artifact has a rough, crystalline texture, with intricate patterns and details etched into its surface
objects.appearance_details: The alien artifact has an otherworldly, pulsing glow, with an energy that seems to emanate from within
objects.pose: The alien artifact is stationary, with an eerie, unsettling presence
objects.orientation: Facing the astronaut, with its glowing surface reflecting off the Martian landscape

structured_prompt.background_setting: The barren, rusty red Martian landscape, with towering rock formations and vast, empty expanses of sand and dust

lighting.conditions: A combination of natural and artificial lighting, with a primary key light from the left side of the frame, slightly elevated to mimic the Martian sun's angle
lighting.direction: 45° key light from the left side of the frame, with a fill light ratio of 1:2 to 1:3 on the opposite side
lighting.shadow: Deep, rich shadows with a moderate to high contrast level, creating a sense of depth and dimension in the scene

aesthetics.composition: Framing technique using the rule of thirds, with the astronaut and the alien artifact placed along the lines and intersections
aesthetics.color_scheme: A dominant red-orange hue, with touches of blue and purple to convey a sense of mystery and wonder
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: Eerie and contemplative, with a sense of awe and wonder

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: Deep (f/11-22), with both the astronaut, the alien artifact, and the Martian landscape in sharp focus
photographic_characteristics.focus: The astronaut and the alien artifact are in sharp focus, with a slight blur to the background
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: Eye-level, providing an intimate and immersive perspective
photographic_characteristics.lens_focal_length: 24mm, matching the wide shot type and providing an appropriate field of view for the scene

structured_prompt.context: Concept for a sci-fi film, capturing a moment of discovery and awe on the Martian landscape

simple_prompt: Astronaut discovers an alien artifact on the barren Martian landscape, evoking a feeling of awe and wonder. Camera: Eye-level, providing an intimate and immersive perspective. Lens: 24mm, matching the wide shot type and providing an appropriate field of view for the scene. Lighting: A combination of natural and artificial lighting, with a primary key light from the left side of the frame, slightly elevated to mimic the Martian sun's angle
